verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father, (echo) we love You. (echo)
We are gathered here to celebrate and worship You.
Father, (echo) we love You. (echo)
You alone deserve our praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, (echo) we love You. (echo)
Perfect Lamb of God; sacrificed to save us.
Jesus, (echo) we love You. (echo)
You alone deserve our praise.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit, (echo) we love You. (echo)
Lead us in the way; make us more like Jesus.
Holy Spirit, (echo) we love You. (echo)
You alone deserve our praise.
